Name: Vestige
About the game: Vestige is a student-made game which won the first prize of the jury at College Lasalle Montreal. Made in four months by a small team of four graduates, Vestige is an action/platforming game which offers vast liberty of movement. Explore diverse and mysterious environments to discover new powers. With your Wall Jump, Dash, and Double Jump, uncover the secrets of an ancient, lost civilization. REACH YOUR OWN PATH Using different platforming abilities, traverse difficult terrains and challenges. There is no finite way to reach your destination: the liberty is yours. FAST-PACED ACTION Hit and dodge your enemies in straightforward, but satisfying fast-paced combat. By unlocking different upgrades, vanquish any enemies that stand in your way and create your own build based on your playstyle. EXPLORE THE WORLD Up to 4 different zones are yours to explore, each with its own theme and ambiance. What secrets will you uncover?
